content: tunisian shaker dishcloths inspired by my knit version no tunisian crochet experience necessary you don t really even need a special tunisian crochet hook pattern includes instructions for coasters as well as info on modifying to any size dishcloths require a total of 20 grams of cotton or cotton-blend yarn each - 10 grams of each color you can see the video tutorial here on my website http //verypink com/2016/01/13/tunisian-crochet-shaker-dishcloths/
